entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
